item.title: 42 Taps FilmNation’s Martin Rakusen as Chief Operating Officer
item.description: Management and production company 42 has named Martin Rakusen as its new chief operating officer, effective immediately. The former FilmNation TV U.K. COO will be responsible for running the company&#
